tool_description: Calculates and tracks statute of limitations deadlines for legal cases based on case type, incident date, and jurisdiction.

case_type.description: Type of legal case or claim

incident_date.description: Date when the incident or cause of action occurred

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction where the case will be filed

discovery_date.description: Date when the cause of action was discovered (if different from incident)

error_messages: Invalid case type: Provide a recognized legal case or claim type
Invalid incident date: Provide a valid date in ISO 8601 format
Invalid jurisdiction: Use a valid legal jurisdiction
Invalid discovery date: Discovery date must be in valid ISO 8601 format and after incident date
Future incident date: Incident date cannot be in the future
usage: Provide case type, incident date, and jurisdiction. Optionally include discovery date if applicable. The tool calculates relevant statute of limitations deadlines and provides alerts.

days_remaining.description: Number of days until the deadline

applicable_statutes.description: List of relevant statute of limitations provisions
